description: Rear garden1 Cryptomeria japonica Sekkan Sugi- remove; 2 Acer palmatum- remove; 3 Olea europaea- remove4 Acacia dealbata subsp. subalpina crown lift up to 4m, removal of poorly positioned crossing branches, any dead wood and weak branches of the main inner branch scaffold5 Syringa species- no works needed;  6 Magnolia soulangeana cultivar- no works needed 7 Eucalyptus gunnii- crown thinning up to 30%, removal of poorly positioned crossing branches, any dead wood and weak branches of the main inner branch scaffold8 Cydonia cultivar- remove; 9 Laurus nobilis removeReason for removing trees 1, 2 and 3- to enable extension, and prevent future damage to foundationsTrees 4 and 7- are overgrown, require the works to ensure trees ongoing health and avoid risk of damage to neighbouring property.Reason for removing trees 8 and 9- to allow space for the rest of the vegetation to thrive, make the garden more spacious and liveable
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
